mapper.select: select t.id,t.commodity_name,t.commodity_amount,t.create_time,t.commodity_status,SUM(t.count) cnt from ( SELECT c.*,IFNULL(o.commodity_count,0) count FROM t_commodity c LEFT JOIN t_orders o ON o.commodity = c.id AND c.commodity_status ='0' AND o.member_id = #{memberId} ) t group by t.id,t.commodity_name,t.commodity_amount,t.create_time,t.commodity_status
